string-array.name: road_surface
string-array.item: Good$Smooth, no ruts deeper than surface material, washboard, potholes or failure of subgrade.
Fair$Minor rutting (<5cm deep, <25%) of road, minor washboard (sections <100m length, minor pot holes repairable with grading, failure of cut or fill slope can be repaired by grader.

Poor$Substantial rutting(>5cm deep, >25%) of road, washboard (sections >100m in length and >2% of road length), pot holes not repairable with grading, failure of cut or fill slope can not be repaired by grader.
Failed*$Condition presents imminent safety or environmental risk.

string-array.name: road_surface_gravel
string-array.item: Good$100% of running surface uniformly graveled with angular material for entire length of road.
Fair$>50% of running surface uniformly graveled with angular material for entire length of road.
Poor$<50% of running surface uniformly graveled with angular material for entire length of road.
Failed*$Condition presents imminent safety or environment risk.

string-array.name: ditches
string-array.item: Good$Ditches flowing freely with no standing water, no signs of erosion, no sedimentation of water bodies, and tail outs are functioning properly.

Fair$Most ditches flowing freely with the odd obstruction, some standing water but not saturating road grade, some minor erosion, no sedimentation of water bodies, ditch blocks and tail outs are functioning properly.

Poor$Ditches obstructed with standing water that is saturating road grade, water flowing directly down road surface, significant erosion, minor sedimentation of water bodies, ditch blocks and tail outs are not functioning properly.

Failed*$Ditches completely obstructed, standing water saturating road surface, water flowing on road surface with sedimentation freely flowing into water bodies, significant erosion, complete failure of ditch blocks or tail outs.

string-array.name: last_crossings
string-array.item: No Issues$No issues on any crossings
Inspection Required$Issue with crossing that requires further inspection with crossing inspection form
